pages.text: Mesosaurus is a semi aquatic reptil from the Permian period. It was a small animal, with a paddle like tail and having elongated teeth, used for catching and eating fish. It is one of the first reptiles known to have returned to the water.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Eggs in Nest
